movies.title: BlacKkKlansman
movies.plot: Colorado Springs, late 1970s. Ron Stallworth, an African American police officer, and Flip Zimmerman, his Jewish colleague, run an undercover operation to infiltrate the Ku Klux Klan.

movies.title: Straight Outta Compton
movies.plot: In 1987, five young men, using brutally honest rhymes and hardcore beats, put their frustration and anger about life in the most dangerous place in America into the most powerful weapon they had: their music.  Taking us back to where it all began, Straight Outta Compton tells the true story of how these cultural rebels—armed only with their lyrics, swagger, bravado and raw talent—stood up to the authorities that meant to keep them down and formed the world’s most dangerous group, N.W.A.  And as they spoke the truth that no one had before and exposed life in the hood, their voice ignited a social revolution that is still reverberating today.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 28 wins & 39 nominations.

movies.title: Unbroken
movies.plot: A chronicle of the life of Louis Zamperini, an Olympic runner who was taken prisoner by Japanese forces during World War II.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 15 wins & 29 nominations.

events.title: Louis Zamperini comes 8th in the Olympic 5,000m race
Louis Zamperini's plane is damaged during a raid on Nauru
Louis Zamperini's plane crashes in the ocean, and the three surviving crew are stranded in inflatable rafts
Louis Zamperini is taken prisoner by the Japanese

movies.title: Steve Jobs
movies.plot: Set backstage at three iconic product launches and ending in 1998 with the unveiling of the iMac, Steve Jobs takes us behind the scenes of the digital revolution to paint an intimate portrait of the brilliant man at its epicenter.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 28 wins & 110 nominations.

events.title: Steve Jobs unveils the new iMac

movies.title: Watchmen
movies.plot: In a gritty and alternate 1985 the glory days of costumed vigilantes have been brought to a close by a government crackdown, but after one of the masked veterans is brutally murdered, an investigation into the killer is initiated. The reunited heroes set out to prevent their own destruction, but in doing so uncover a sinister plot that puts all of humanity in grave danger.

events.title: Jonathan Osterman is introduced to Janey Slater
a room full of people wearing disguises meet
"tonight, a Comedian died in New York"
Rorschach and the Nite Owl try to stop Ozymandias

movies.title: We Are Marshall
movies.plot: When a plane crash claims the lives of members of the Marshall University football team and some of its fans, the team's new coach and his surviving players try to keep the football program alive.

events.title: Southern Airways Flight 932 crashes, killing 37 members of the Marshall University football team
Marshall's first win after the loss of 37 players, against Xavier University
